name: Kropáček LEGAL, advokátní kancelář, s.r.o.
goal: We are the law firm providing legal services especially in the Czech Republic. We mainly focus on IT / IP law, business law, corporate law, real estate law, consumer law and financial law.
interests: Audiovisual and Media, Consumer Affairs, Enterprise, Financial Stability, Financial Services and Capital Markets Union , Information Society, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Research and Technology, Trade
